column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Townsman says : " Avatar Korra !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I hate to get down to business , but is the airbender here now ?
#Text=" Townsman says : " Kuon and his family will be joining us shortly for a special dinner .
#Text=Please , right this way .
#Text=Kuon has been the talk of the town ever since he 's got airbending ; he 's like a local celebrity .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I just want to say it 's an honor to meet a fellow airbender .
#Text=" Kuon says : " Oh , I still think of myself as a simple farmer .
#Text=Who can airbend !
#Text=Oh , I 'm so sorry !
#Text=I still do n't have any control .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No worries !
#Text=I love pie .
#Text=And so does Pabu .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Well , you 're so much more than just a farmer now .
#Text=Harmonic Convergence changed everything .
#Text=You represent the future of a culture that is being reborn .
#Text=You 're going to help us rebuild the Air Nation .
#Text=" Kuon says : " I 'm gon na do what now ?
#Text=The only thing I 'm planning to rebuild is my barn .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " But you must come with us to the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=" Kuon says : " Well , I ca n't do that .
#Text=I have a family and a farm .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Of course you can come .
#Text=This is of the utmost importance .
#Text=Your wife will understand .
#Text=" Kuon 's wife says : " Wait , what ?
#Text=No , I do not understand .
#Text=" Kuon 's daughter says : " Daddy , where are you going ?
#Text=Why does the bald man want to take you away ?
#Text=" Kuon 's wife says : " No one 's going to take Daddy away , sweetheart .
#Text=" Korra says : " Actually , this bald man does want to take him , but it 's for an important cause .
#Text=Your dad is an airbender , and he should learn about his culture .
#Text=" Kuon says : " I think there 's been some sort of misunderstanding .
#Text=I 'm not going with you .
#Text=I might be able to airbend , but I 'm no Air Nomad , I 'm no monk .
#Text=" Townsman says : " Okay , maybe we should just have some dessert huh ?
#Text=Who 's up for dessert ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Sir , you must understand , you 're an airbender now , and there are thousands of years of culture you must learn about , skills you must master .
#Text=" Kuon says : " You expect me to abandon my entire life ?
#Text=My family ?
#Text=No !
#Text=No sir , I 'm not going anywhere with you and I think it 's best that you leave .
#Text="
